sources.title: Prehistoric Women (1950)
sources.description: Tigri and her stone age friends, all of which are women, hate all men. However, she and her Amazon tribe see men as a "necessary evil" and capture them for potential husbands. Engor, who is smarter than the rest of the men, is able to escape them. He discovers fire and battle enormous beasts. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/prehistoric-women-1950/

sources.title: Prehistoric Women
sources.description: Title: Prehistoric Women Summary: A civilization of gorgeous cavewomen abduct men for mating purposes. One of their victims is Engor, who seems to be smarter than the rest of the men. He discovers fire, battles a monstrous ... Directed by: Gregg G. Tallas Actors: Production Company: Alliance Productions Release Date: 1 November 1950 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A civilization of gorgeous cavewomen abduct men for mating purposes. One of their victims is Engor, who seems to be smarter than the rest of the men. He discovers fire, battles a monstrous giant and attempts to win the hand of the prehistoric queen.

sources.title: Prehistoric Women (1950) LAURETTE LUEZ
sources.description:
Stars: Laurette Luez, Allan Nixon, Joan Shawlee
Director: Gregg C. Tallas

A civilization of gorgeous cave women abduct men for mating purposes. What more do you need to know!

metadata.Plot: A civilization of gorgeous cavewomen abduct men for mating purposes. One of their victims is Engor, who seems to be smarter than the rest of the men. He discovers fire, battles a monstrous giant and attempts to win the hand of the prehistoric queen.
metadata.Writer: Sam X. Abarbanel, Gregg G. Tallas
metadata.Actors: Laurette Luez, Allan Nixon, Joan Shawlee
